# Code of Conduct

## Smart Resume AI Project

This project is developed by **Shashi Kumar** as part of the B.Tech CSE curriculum at CGC Jhanjeri.

All contributors and users are expected to follow this Code of Conduct to maintain a respectful and professional environment.

---

## 1. Our Values

We aim to build this project in a positive and ethical manner by following these values:

- Respect for all contributors
- Honesty in work
- Teamwork and cooperation
- Support for learning and growth
- Responsibility in using technology

---

## 2. Expected Behavior

All participants are expected to:

- Communicate politely and professionally
- Respect different opinions and ideas
- Provide constructive feedback
- Help others when possible
- Follow academic and ethical guidelines

---

## 3. Unacceptable Behavior

The following actions are not allowed:

- Harassment, discrimination, or abusive language
- Personal attacks or threats
- Sharing private information without permission
- Any activity that harms the project or its members
- Plagiarism or misuse of content

---

## 4. Reporting Issues

If you face any problem related to behavior or misuse of this project, please report it to:

**Project Developer:** Shashi Kumar  
**Email:** sk5251476@gmail.com

All reports will be handled responsibly.

---

## 5. Contribution Guidelines

If you want to contribute to this project:

- Follow proper coding practices
- Write clear commit messages
- Test your changes before submission
- Maintain documentation

All contributions should be original and ethical.

---

## 6. Academic Integrity

This project is developed for educational purposes.

Any form of cheating, copying, or misrepresentation is strictly discouraged.

Users are expected to maintain academic honesty.

---

## 7. Final Note

This project is built to help students improve their resumes using AI technology.

Let us work together respectfully to improve and maintain this system.

Thank you for your cooperation.

---

Developed by: **Shashi Kumar**  
B.Tech CSE | CGC Jhanjeri | 2026
